sentences.en: An aspiratded blade - alveolar affricate. It is an aspirated equivalent of [ z ] .
sentences.cn: 舌尖前送气塞擦音. 是与z相对应的 关气音.

sentences.en: But the retrusion of alveolar mandible led to chin protrusion.
sentences.cn: 前颅底和下颌骨发育正常,而下牙槽突代偿性后缩可导致成年腭裂患者的假性颏前突.

sentences.en: Conclusion: The X ray magnifying power is different depending alveolar areas.
sentences.cn: 结论: 不同区域的牙槽骨X线放大率不同.

sentences.en: High - dose corticosteroids proved effective in controlling alveolar hemorrhage in all cases.
sentences.cn: 大剂量应用皮质激素对控制肺泡出血有效.

sentences.en: Objective In order to discuss CT features of alveolar echinococcosis.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨肺泡状棘球蚴病的CT表现特征.

sentences.en: Objective To explore dysfuction mechanism of rat alveolar type ( AT - ) injured by bleomycin ( BLM ).
sentences.cn: 目的探讨博莱霉素 ( BLM ) 对肺泡型上皮细胞 ( AT - ) 功能的损伤作用.

sentences.en: Pulmonary alveolar proteinosis ( PAP ) is an uncommon disease of the lung.
sentences.cn: 肺泡 蛋白质沉积 症 是一种少见的肺部疾病.

sentences.en: PURPOSE: To analyse the results of using Bioglass to repair alveolar cleft.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察人工骨修复材料-倍骼生治疗牙槽突裂的临床效果.

sentences.en: Purpose: To improve the diagnostic accuracy of alveolar cell carcinoma.
sentences.cn: 目的: 采用CT扫描,提高肺泡癌的正确诊断率.

sentences.en: Results is prostaglandin E 2 in the alveolar of rats under no influences.
sentences.cn: 结果:未受力时,大鼠的牙槽骨内即存在一定数量的前列腺素E2.

sentences.en: The alveolar macrophage is derived largely from the bone marrow.
sentences.cn: 肺泡巨噬细胞主要是从骨髓中分化出来的.

sentences.en: The alveolar macrophage is particularly rich in the variety of proteolytic enzymes.
sentences.cn: 肺泡巨噬细胞特别富含各种蛋白质水解酶.

sentences.en: The effects of quartz on membranous fluidity labelled with DPH and ANS and the production of oxygen free radicals of alveolar macrophages were studied in vitro.
sentences.cn: 采用体外细胞实验方法，观察了石英尘对DPH和ANS标记的肺胞巨噬细胞膜流动性和荧光性质的影响，同时测定了肺泡巨噬细胞活性氧的产生。

sentences.en: Their principle function is production of type III collagen, elastin, and proteoglycans of the extracellular matrix of the alveolar septa.
sentences.cn: 其主要的功能是产生III型胶原，弹性蛋白和肺泡隔细胞外基质中的蛋白多糖。

sentences.en: This is normal lung microscopically. The alveolar walls are thin and delicate.
sentences.cn: 正常肺显微镜显示肺泡壁比较薄弱.

sentences.en: Tooth loss accompanied by alveolar bone resorption presents a significant clinical problem.
sentences.cn: 牙齿缺失伴有牙槽骨吸收的病例是典型的临床问题.

sentences.en: We detected total phospholipids ( TPL ), desaturated phosphatidylcholine ( DSPC ), total protein ( TP ) in broncho - alveolar lavage fluid ( BALF ).
sentences.cn: 用卵白蛋白腹腔注射与雾化吸入造成哮喘动物模型,测支气管肺泡灌洗液 ( BALF ) 中总磷脂 ( TPL ) 、 饱和磷脂酰胆碱 ( DSPC ) 、 总蛋白 ( TP ) 含量.

words.tran_cn: [生物] 蜂窝状的；有肺泡的

trans.tran_en: of, relating to, or resembling an alveolus
a  consonant  sound such as /  t  / or /  d  / that you make by putting the end of your tongue behind your upper front teeth
